message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, let's meet in the middle
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still here
Alice, this is ridiculous. I'm offering a near even split. Don't be greedy, let's end this.
Near even split? You're still ahead, let's correct that
Okay, Alice, you win. This is a tiny bit in your favor.  Let's just end this before we both lose out!
